content: willow socklets gauge 9 sts 11 25 rws per inch needles 2 25 mm dpns yarn about 230 to 450 yards of any sock yarn will do many people will prefer to use a cotton yarn if the socks will primarily be used for summer i was able to complete a pair women s size 8 socklets using just shy of one 230 yd skein of knitpicks stroll glimmer in white ___________________________________________________________________ cuff/ leg chart cast on 72 sts loosely divide sts on 4 dpns 18 sts per needle join in the round cuff work only round one of the cuff/ leg chart for 8 rnds leg work row 1-4 of the cuff/ leg chart to desired length for sample socklets the chart was repeated twice to set up for the heel slip the stitches from needle two onto needle one you will work back and forth on these 36 sts to complete the heel flap beginning with the rs facing heel flap rw 1 *sl 1 purlwise k1 repeat from * to end rw 2 sl 1 purlwise p to end rw 3 sl 1 *sl1 k1 repeat from * end k2 rw 4 repeat rw 2 repeat these 4 row until 32 row have been completed turn heel for the turning of the heel sl1 will always mean slip 1 purlwise rw 1 rs k 19 ssk k1 turn rw 2 ws sl 1 p 3 p2tog p1 turn rw 3 rs sl 1 k 4 ssk k1 turn rw 4 ws sl 1 p 5 p2tog p1 turn rw 5 rs sl 1 k 6 ssk k1 turn rw 6 ws sl 1 p 7 p2tog p1 turn rw 7 rs sl 1 k 8 ssk k1 turn rw 8 ws sl 1 p 9 p2tog p1 turn rw 9 rs sl 1 k 10 ssk k1 turn rw 10 ws sl 1 p 11 p2tog p1 turn rw 11 rs sl 1 k 12 ssk k1 turn rw 12 ws sl 1 p 13 p2tog p1 turn rw 13 rs sl 1 k 14 ssk k1 turn rw 14 ws sl 1 p 15 p2tog p1 turn rw 15 rs sl 1 k 16 ssk k1 turn rw 16 ws sl 1 p 17 p2tog p1 turn 20 sts remain work 10 sts this is now the beginning of the round heel gusset with a free needle knit remaining 10 heel sts n1 continuing with the same needle pick up 16 sts along the side of the heel pick up and knit a st from row below the first instep st to prevent a hole with a free needle work across 18 instep sts following chart begin with the round on the chart that comes after the row you ended with on the cuff/leg n2 with a free needle work across 18 instep sts following chart begin with the round on the
